title: Remove persistent arrow icon from 5-Star Rated Service card in WhyChooseUs

requirements.text: In WhyChooseUs.tsx, perform a thorough audit of all JSX elements within the '5-Star Rated Service' (or '5-Star Customer Experience') card and remove every arrow, chevron, or directional icon element — including any ArrowRight, ChevronRight, or similar Lucide/SVG icons — that appears anywhere inside that card's heading, label, body, or wrapper. Ensure no arrow or chevron of any kind remains visible on that card after the change.

quotes: the arrow by the top were it says 5 started rated service is still there remove the little arrow please

acceptanceCriteria: The '5-Star Rated Service' / '5-Star Customer Experience' card in WhyChooseUs.tsx renders with no arrow, chevron, or directional icon of any kind.
All other cards in the Why Choose Us section are unaffected.
The referral and loyalty reward cards added previously remain intact and unmodified.

constraints: Do not alter any other cards in the Why Choose Us section.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Changing the layout, copy, or styling of any other section.
Modifying the backend in any way.
